<div style="float: right;"><img src="http://i.imgur.com/ZzzjcZf.jpg" alt="" width="200" border="0" style="margin: 10px 5px 5px 20px;"></div>

KSP-TV Launch Announcement

We here at SQUAD would like to announce the start of KSP-TV, a Twitch.tv live streaming channel dedicated to Kerbal Space Program. SQUAD is happy to sponsor and support our community of live streaming gamers that help us spread the word of KSP. In return, we hope to give these broadcasters the exposure they need to grow their fan-base. KSP-TV will bring regularly scheduled programming so viewers can find the streaming content they want and know when to come back for more.

You can find KSP-TV at:

http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv

You can find the programming schedule here:

[thread=37055]KSP-TV-Programming-Schedule[/thread]
